Hahahahaha!\""},{"lineNumber":229834,"originalJapaneseLine":"「な……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Wha...\""},{"lineNumber":229835,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なんちゅう落ち着きのないコンビだ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What an unsettled pair they are...\""},{"lineNumber":229836,"originalJapaneseLine":"「レリコフはなんたって魔王の子一の、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"After all, Lerikoff is the most energetic child of the Demon Lord,\""},{"lineNumber":229837,"originalJapaneseLine":"　元気な子だから」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"because she's a lively child.\""},{"lineNumber":229838,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ただのアホだ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Just an idiot.\""},{"lineNumber":229839,"originalJapaneseLine":"「で、どうしてみんなこんな所に……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"So, why is everyone here...\""},{"lineNumber":229840,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ああああああ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Aaaaaah!\""},{"lineNumber":229841,"originalJapaneseLine":"「魔王退治の旅！　オーブを集めに！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"A journey to defeat the Demon Lord! What do we do, what should we do!\""},{"lineNumber":229845,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ヒーロー、これじゃ作戦がぁぁぁ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hero, at this rate the plan's ruined!\""},{"lineNumber":229846,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、そっか！　どうしよう！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, that's right! What should we do!\""},{"lineNumber":229847,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……作戦？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Plan?\""},{"lineNumber":229848,"originalJapaneseLine":"「だって、みんなでオーブを取りに行くんでしょ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Because, we're all going to get the orbs together, right?\""},{"lineNumber":229849,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そーそー。おばさんに聞いたんだよ、オイラ達」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yeah, yeah. We heard it from the lady.\""},{"lineNumber":229850,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ってことはさぁ――」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"So that means—\""},{"lineNumber":229851,"originalJapaneseLine":"「さー、今からオーブを取りに行こーう」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Come on, let's go get the orbs now!\""},{"lineNumber":229852,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そうでヤンス、そうでヤンス、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That's right, that's right, yansu,"},{"lineNumber":229853,"originalJapaneseLine":"　探しに行くでヤンス」","translatedEnglishLine":"we're off to search for them, yansu.\""},{"lineNumber":229854,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふっ、大変な旅になりそうでゲスな……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmph, it looks like it's going to be a tough journey, desu na...\""},{"lineNumber":229855,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ちょっとまったー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Wait just a moment!\""},{"lineNumber":229856,"originalJapaneseLine":"バーーーン！","translatedEnglishLine":"*Bam!*"},{"lineNumber":229857,"originalJapaneseLine":"部屋の大扉が開かれる！","translatedEnglishLine":"The large door of the room opens!"},{"lineNumber":229858,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ああっ、その声は！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, that voice!?\""},{"lineNumber":229859,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ばばーん！　お探しのものはこれかな！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ta-da! Is this what you were looking for!?\""},{"lineNumber":229860,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そ、それは探していたオーブ！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Th-That’s the orb we were looking for!"},{"lineNumber":229861,"originalJapaneseLine":"　それがどうしてここに！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"How come it’s here!?\""},{"lineNumber":229862,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふっふっふっ……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Fufu...\""},{"lineNumber":229863,"originalJapaneseLine":"　先にボク達だけで取ってきたのさ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"We went ahead and got it ourselves!\""},{"lineNumber":229864,"originalJapaneseLine":"「わーっ、すごいぞ、レリコフ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Wow, amazing, Lerikoff!\""},{"lineNumber":229865,"originalJapaneseLine":"「へへーん」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Heh heh—\""},{"lineNumber":229866,"originalJapaneseLine":"「よっ、天才、偉い、かっこいー」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hey, genius, great job, so cool!\""},{"lineNumber":229867,"originalJapaneseLine":"「へっへへへーーーん♪」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Heh heh heh heeeeen♪\""},{"lineNumber":229868,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……って」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...I wanted to say that, but...\""},{"lineNumber":229869,"originalJapaneseLine":"「したかったんだけどなぁ……はあ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"I wanted to... but... *sigh*...\""},{"lineNumber":229870,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……くっだらねーこと考えやがって」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Thinking up such a stupid thing.\""},{"lineNumber":229871,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はあ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Sigh...\""},{"lineNumber":229872,"originalJapaneseLine":"「でも、二人だけで行こうとするなんてすごいよ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"But trying to go alone, just the two of you, that's amazing."},{"lineNumber":229873,"originalJapaneseLine":"　お姉ちゃんには出来ないよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Big sister couldn't do that.\""},{"lineNumber":229874,"originalJapaneseLine":"「二人ともとってもすごいよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Both of you are truly amazing.\""},{"lineNumber":229875,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……ほ、ほんと？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Re-really?\""},{"lineNumber":229876,"originalJapaneseLine":"「リセット様の仰る通りだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Just as Lord Reset says."},{"lineNumber":229877,"originalJapaneseLine":"　とっても立派でとっても勇気がありますだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"You are very admirable and very courageous."},{"lineNumber":229878,"originalJapaneseLine":"　お、おら、感動しましただ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"I-I'm truly moved...\""},{"lineNumber":229879,"originalJapaneseLine":"「う、うんうん、私よりも勇気あって偉いよ……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Y-Yeah, yeah, you have more courage than me, you're great...\""},{"lineNumber":229880,"originalJapaneseLine":"　私なんて……とても……」","translatedEnglishLine":"As for me... not at all...\""},{"lineNumber":229881,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ういうい、さすが姉上。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Indeed, as expected of big sister."},{"lineNumber":229882,"originalJapaneseLine":"　立派でござる」","translatedEnglishLine":"You are admirable.\""},{"lineNumber":229883,"originalJapaneseLine":"「えへへ、そーかな、そーかな」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hehe, really? Really?\""},{"lineNumber":229884,"originalJapaneseLine":"「えへへへへ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hehehehehe.\""},{"lineNumber":229885,"originalJapaneseLine":"みんなに偉い偉いと頭を撫でられて、","translatedEnglishLine":"Everyone patted their heads saying \"good, good,\""},{"lineNumber":229886,"originalJapaneseLine":"二人はとっても照れていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"and the two of them were very embarrassed."},{"lineNumber":229887,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":229888,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　＜ぎゅっ＞","translatedEnglishLine":"<Hug>"},{"lineNumber":229889,"originalJapaneseLine":"深根はあなたに突然抱きついてきた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Fukane suddenly hugged you."},{"lineNumber":229890,"originalJapaneseLine":"「へ、ど、どしたん？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"He-hey, wh-what's wrong?\""},{"lineNumber":229891,"originalJapaneseLine":"「末っ子の座……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"The position of youngest child...\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんちゅう落ち着きのないコンビだ……」
「レリコフはなんたって魔王の子一の、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "After all, Lerikoff is the most energetic child of the Demon Lord,"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「で、どうしてみんなこんな所に……」
「魔王退治の旅！　オーブを集めに！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "A journey to defeat the Demon Lord! To gather the orbs!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、シーラさんから事情は聞いてる？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, have you heard the situation from Sheila?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そうそう、それでレリコフちゃんも迎えに――」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That's right, and then Lerikoff-chan came to fetch you—"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あっ、あっ！　どうしよ、どうする！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, ah! What do we do, what should we do!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ヒーロー、これじゃ作戦がぁぁぁ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hero, at this rate the plan's ruined!"
"Ah, that's right! What should we do!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「だって、みんなでオーブを取りに行くんでしょ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Because, we're all going to get the orbs together, right?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そーそー。おばさんに聞いたんだよ、オイラ達」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yeah, yeah. We heard it from the lady."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「さー、今からオーブを取りに行こーう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Come on, let's go get the orbs now!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そうでヤンス、そうでヤンス、

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: we're off to search for them, yansu."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふっ、大変な旅になりそうでゲスな……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmph, it looks like it's going to be a tough journey, desu na..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 部屋の大扉が開かれる！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The large door of the room opens!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ばばーん！　お探しのものはこれかな！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ta-da! Is this what you were looking for!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そ、それは探していたオーブ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Th-That’s the orb we were looking for!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それがどうしてここに！？」
先にボク達だけで取ってきたのさ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We went ahead and got it ourselves!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「したかったんだけどなぁ……はあ……」
「……くっだらねーこと考えやがって」
「でも、二人だけで行こうとするなんてすごいよ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "But trying to go alone, just the two of you, that's amazing.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お姉ちゃんには出来ないよ」
「二人ともとってもすごいよ」
とっても立派でとっても勇気がありますだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You are very admirable and very courageous.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お、おら、感動しましただ……」
「う、うんうん、私よりも勇気あって偉いよ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Y-Yeah, yeah, you have more courage than me, you're great..."
As for me... not at all..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: みんなに偉い偉いと頭を撫でられて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Everyone patted their heads saying "good, good,"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 二人はとっても照れていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and the two of them were very embarrassed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 深根はあなたに突然抱きついてきた。

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English
